content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler (position x=-5.0, y=2.5)
- Steam engine (position x=0.5, y=6.5)
- Connected with pipe groups for water and steam
- Fueled with coal (27 units in boiler)

### Coal Mining Setup at position(15.5, 8.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=15.5, y=8.5)
- Wooden chest for collection (position x=15.5, y=10.5)
- Small electric poles for power connection
- Currently mining coal (701 units in chest)

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=15.5, y=70.5)
- Wooden chest for collection (position x=15.5, y=72.5)
- Small electric poles for power connection
- Currently mining iron ore (463 units in chest)
- Inserter (position x=16.5, y=72.5) to take items from chest
- Transport belt system starting at x=16.5, y=74.5 (working, contains 50 iron ore)

### Iron Smelting Area at position(17.0, 76.0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces (positions x=17.0, y=76.0; x=20.0, y=76.0; x=23.0, y=76.0; x=26.0, y=76.0)
- 4 Output inserters (positions x=17.5, y=77.5; x=20.5, y=77.5; x=23.5, y=77.5; x=26.5, y=77.5)
- Output belt system (positions x=17.5, y=79.5 to x=26.5, y=79.5)
- Small electric poles for power connection
- Each furnace has coal as fuel and is actively smelting iron ore
- New belts placed at output inserter drop positions (x=17.5, y=78.5; x=20.5, y=78.5; x=23.5, y=78.5)

### Steel Smelting Area at position(35.0, 76.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position x=35.0, y=76.0)
- Fueled with coal (18 units)
- Used for smelting steel plates from iron plates

### Copper Ore Mining Setup at position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=-46.5, y=70.5)
- Wooden chest for collection (position x=-46.5, y=72.5)
- Small electric poles for power connection
- Currently mining copper ore (523 units in chest)
- Inserter to take items from chest (position x=-46.5, y=73.5)
- Transport belt (position x=-46.5, y=74.5 to x=-45.5, y=74.5) containing 7 copper ore

### Copper Smelting Area at position(-45.0, 76.0)
Consists of:
- 2 Stone furnaces (positions x=-45.0, y=76.0; x=-42.0, y=76.0)
- Input inserter for second furnace (position x=-41.5, y=74.5)
- 2 Output inserters (positions x=-44.5, y=77.5; x=-41.5, y=77.5)
- Output belt system (positions x=-45.5, y=79.5 to x=-40.5, y=79.5)
- Small electric poles for power connection
- Each furnace has coal as fuel and is actively smelting copper ore
- New belts placed at output inserter drop positions

### Firearm Magazine Assembly at position(31.5, 83.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position x=31.5, y
